location_descriptions.00: A plain of grass stretches out around you. Flowers sway gently in the breeze. You detect no sign of civilisation.
location_descriptions.01: The grass comes up to your knees. A long trail of trampled vegetation stretches behind you.
location_descriptions.02: Gentle hills rise and fall here. Standing at the crest of one, you survey your surroundings. More grass. More hills. Nothing else.
location_descriptions.03: In a field of grass, you find a lone pond. The water is clear; you can see all the way to the bottom. Nothing stirs beneath the surface.

encounter.start: As you travel, you encounter a foe!
